data.name: RiMS Racing: Japanese Manufacturers Package
data.detailed_description:
The Japanese Manufacturers Pack includes 76 spare parts, liveries and rider suits, which will be added to your inventory to upgrade your Honda, Kawasaki, Suzuki and Yamaha motorcycles.
- Honda: 1 official livery + 10 Performance parts for the CBR1000RR ABS 2019
- Kawasaki: 1 official livery, 1 rider suit + 10 Performance parts for the Ninja ZX-10RR 2019
- Suzuki: 1 official livery, 1 rider suit + 10 Performance parts for the GSX-R1000R 2019
- Yamaha: 1 official livery, 1 rider suit + 10 Performance parts for the YZF-R1 2020
The parts pack also includes 16 Pirelli front tyres and 16 rear tyres, and 4 Brembo Stylema front brake calipers compatible with all four Japanese motorcycles.
data.about_the_game:
The Japanese Manufacturers Pack includes 76 spare parts, liveries and rider suits, which will be added to your inventory to upgrade your Honda, Kawasaki, Suzuki and Yamaha motorcycles.
- Honda: 1 official livery + 10 Performance parts for the CBR1000RR ABS 2019
- Kawasaki: 1 official livery, 1 rider suit + 10 Performance parts for the Ninja ZX-10RR 2019
- Suzuki: 1 official livery, 1 rider suit + 10 Performance parts for the GSX-R1000R 2019
- Yamaha: 1 official livery, 1 rider suit + 10 Performance parts for the YZF-R1 2020
The parts pack also includes 16 Pirelli front tyres and 16 rear tyres, and 4 Brembo Stylema front brake calipers compatible with all four Japanese motorcycles.
data.short_description: The Japanese Manufacturers Pack includes 76 spare parts, 4 motorcycle liveries and 3 rider suits for Honda, Kawasaki, Suzuki and Yamaha motorcycles.
data.supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Arabic, Japanese*, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese*, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2300 or AMD FX-6300
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVDIA GeForce GTX 750, 2 GB or AMD Radeon HD 7850, 2 GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-4790 or AMD Ryzen 5 1500X
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060, 6 GB or AMD Radeon RX 580, 4 GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
